project.name: customvisualization
project.description: Shows how the chart themes could be used to change the look and feel of all chart types.

target.name: javac
target.description: Compiles the java source files of the test application.

target.name: components
target.description: Builds the components.

target.name: compile
target.description: Compiles the XML report design and produces the .jasper file.

target.name: fill
target.description: Fills the compiled report design with data and produces the .jrprint file.

target.name: view
target.description: Launches the report viewer to preview the report stored in the .jrprint file.

target.name: viewXml
target.description: Launches the report viewer to preview the generated report stored in an XML file.

target.name: print
target.description: Sends the report in the .jrprint file to the printer.

target.name: pdf
target.description: Generates a PDF version of the report by converting the .jrprint file.

target.name: xml
target.description: Generates an XML version of the report by converting the .jrprint file.

target.name: xmlEmbed
target.description: Generates an XML version of the report by converting the .jrprint file.

target.name: html
target.description: Generates an HTML version of the report by converting the .jrprint file.

target.name: rtf
target.description: Generates an RTF version of the report by converting the .jrprint file.

target.name: xls
target.description: Generates an XLS version of the report by converting the .jrprint file using the POI library.

target.name: csv
target.description: Generates a CSV version of the report by converting the .jrprint file.

target.name: odt
target.description: Generates an ODT version of the report by converting the .jrprint file.

target.name: ods
target.description: Generates an ODS version of the report by converting the .jrprint file.

target.name: docx
target.description: Generates a DOCX version of the report by converting the .jrprint file.

target.name: xlsx
target.description: Generates an XLSX version of the report by converting the .jrprint file.

target.name: pptx
target.description: Generates a PPTX version of the report by converting the .jrprint file.

target.name: viewDesignXml
target.description: Launches the design viewer to preview the XML report design.

target.name: viewDesign
target.description: Launches the design viewer to preview the compiled report design.

target.name: decompile
target.description: Decompiles a .jasper file into a .jrxml file.

target.name: writeApi
target.description: Generates a .java version of the report by converting the .jrxml file.

target.name: writeApiXml
target.description: Generates a .jrxml version of the report by executing the API version of the report design.

target.name: clean
target.description: Deletes all the generated files.

target.name: test
target.description: Runs the sample.
